title: OCE Normal Draft?
body:
Yoooo any rioters combing the threads can confirm the new champ select is coming to normals??

been a few weeks with it in ranked but no word of it for normals yet. i know the other regions have ranked draft, normal draft and normal blind pick.... not sure why blind pick is still a thing seeing champ select is a pretty important part of the game now too.
i just figure if spamming your role and hoping you don't have trolls or insta-lockers is not good enough for ranked why is it ok for normals.

i have no intention of playing ranked with all the competitive people but im also so so so sick of the obnoxiousness that is blind pick, just replace it entirely if we cant get short Que times for all 3 Que's Imo

replies.body:
^ +1

A 5 or even 10 minute queue time as opposed to 20 minutes and surrender because of the obnoxiousness (a good word for it) that Blink Pick attracts is worth it as far as I'm concerned.
So 2 Months have passed still no word on the new dynamic que for non ranked games :(
Does OCE not have the new Champ Select for Normal Draft yet? If not, you will get it eventually. They will be implementing a version for Blind Pick later.
